item.title: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos
item.ExtractedText: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Updated 1051 GMT (1851 HKT) March 22, 2016 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Wisconsin's bench reacts after Bronson Koenig hit a last-second 3-pointer to defeat Xavier in the second round of the NCAA Tournament on Sunday, March 20. Koenig made six 3-pointers in the game as the Badgers won 66-63. Hide Caption 1 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Fernando Alonso crashes into a wall during the Australian Grand Prix on Sunday, March 20. Alonso was going 200 mph at the time of the crash, but he emerged unscathed. "I am lucky to be here and thankful to be here. It was a scary moment and a scary crash," he said. Hide Caption 2 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Serena Williams slides for a shot Sunday, March 20, during the final of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, California. Victoria Azarenka defeated Williams 6-4, 6-4. Hide Caption 3 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Wayne Hutchinson falls off Montbazon during a race at the Cheltenham Racecourse in England on Friday, March 18. He was able to walk away after the accident. Hide Caption 4 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Tina Weirather, a skier from Liechtenstein, races during the World Cup event in St. Moritz, Switzerland, on Thursday, March 17. She finished first in the super-G -- her second World Cup victory of the season. Hide Caption 5 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos NASCAR driver Jimmie Johnson celebrates on his Superman-themed car after winning the Sprint Cup race in Fontana, California, on Sunday, March 20. Hide Caption 6 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Ohio State wrestler Myles Martin jumps after defeating Penn State's Bo Nickal for the NCAA's 174-pound title on Saturday, March 19. Hide Caption 7 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Slovenian ski jumper Anze Semenic competes at the World Cup event in Planica, Slovenia, on Saturday, March 19. The home team finished in second behind Norway. Hide Caption 8 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Kieran Foran of the Parramatta Eels, left, tackles Tony Williams of the Canterbury Bulldogs during a National Rugby League match in Sydney on Friday, March 18. Hide Caption 9 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Lewis Brinson is welcomed by his Texas Rangers teammates after his home run won a spring-training game in San Antonio on Friday, March 18. Hide Caption 10 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Legendary golfer Arnold Palmer smiles as Jason Day's son, Dash, kisses the trophy his dad got for winning the Arnold Palmer Invitational on Sunday, March 20. Hide Caption 11 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Rafael Nadal hits a forehand in the fourth round of the BNP Paribas Open on Wednesday, March 16. Hide Caption 12 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Utah's Trey Lyles, left, faces off with Cleveland's Channing Frye during an NBA game in Salt Lake City on Tuesday, March 15. Both were ejected from the game for the confrontation, which happened after Lyles's elbow hit Frye in the groin during play. Hide Caption 13 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos British divers Tom Daley and Daniel Goodfellow perform synchronized dives Thursday, March 17, during the World Series event in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. They finished second on the 10-meter platform. Hide Caption 14 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Michigan State's Jasmine Hines, left, battles Mississippi State's Chinwe Okorie for a ball during an NCAA Tournament game in Starkville, Mississippi, on Sunday, March 20. The home team advanced with a 74-72 victory. Hide Caption 15 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos A participant hits the water during the Red Bull Jump and Freeze competition in Gudauri, Georgia, on Sunday, March 20. Hide Caption 16 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Texas guard Isaiah Taylor reacts after Northern Iowa's Paul Jesperson hit a half-court shot to beat the Longhorns in the first round of the NCAA Tournament on Friday, March 18. Hide Caption 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Bodybuilders pose during the Arnold Classic in Melbourne on Saturday, March 19. Hide Caption 18 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Golden State's Harrison Barnes has his shot blocked by Danny Green, right, and Kawhi Leonard during an NBA game in San Antonio on Saturday, March 19. San Antonio won 87-79 in what was a matchup of the NBA's two best teams. The Warriors have lost only seven games this season. The Spurs have lost 11. Hide Caption 19 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos German gymnast Andreas Toba practices on the rings Saturday, March 19, at the World Cup event in Stuttgart, Germany. Hide Caption 20 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Whitney Jones competes in a fitness competition during the Arnold Classic in Melbourne on Saturday, March 19. Hide Caption 21 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Japan's Wakaba Higuchi skates her short program Friday, March 18, during the World Junior Figure Skating Championships in Debrecen, Hungary. She won the bronze. Hide Caption 22 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Polish high jumper Kamila Licwinko clears the bar Sunday, March 20, during the World Indoor Championships in Portland, Oregon. She finished in third place. Hide Caption 23 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos A foiling catamaran is skippered by Bleddyn Mon during an Extreme Sailing Series race in Muscat, Oman, on Friday, March 18. Hide Caption 24 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Fans of the Los Angeles Dodgers cheer for their team while watching a spring-training game in Phoenix on Saturday, March 19. Hide Caption 25 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Logovi'i Mulipola, a rugby player with the Leicester Tigers, is tackled by Saracens players during a Premiership match in Leicester, England, on Sunday, March 20. Hide Caption 26 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Calgary's Joe Colborne raises his stick after scoring a goal during an NHL game in Montreal on Sunday, March 20. Hide Caption 27 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Kansas' Jamari Traylor and Austin Peay's Chris Horton reach for a rebound during an NCAA Tournament game on Thursday, March 17. Kansas, the tournament's top seed, rolled to the second round with a 105-79 victory. Hide Caption 28 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos New York Yankees left fielder Brett Gardner crashes into the wall during a spring-training game in Fort Myers, Florida, on Sunday, March 20. Hide Caption 29 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos A Manchester City fan points at Manchester United fans after the two English soccer teams faced off on Sunday, March 20. United won 1-0 in City's Etihad Stadium. Hide Caption 30 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Cricket players from New South Wales celebrate Friday, March 18, during a Sheffield Shield match against Victoria in Alice Springs, Australia. The match ended in a draw. Hide Caption 31 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos Oklahoma's Ryan Spangler, right, has the ball knocked away by members of Cal State Bakersfield during an NCAA Tournament game on Friday, March 18. Oklahoma won 82-68 to advance to the second round. Hide Caption 32 of 33 33 photos: What a shot! 33 amazing sports photos American skier Mikaela Shiffrin takes part in a World Cup slalom race that she won in St. Moritz, Switzerland, on Saturday, March 19. See 35 amazing sports photos from last week Hide Caption
